answers.answer: The Romanian authorities have been offering various language courses, including Ukrainian, for refugees from Ukraine who seek to improve their language skills in order to facilitate communication with locals and integrate into society better. These courses cover different levels - beginner, intermediate, and advanced - and they provide an opportunity for both children and adults to learn or enhance their knowledge of the local language. Additionally, there are other cultural activities organized by volunteers, which help refugees adapt to life in Romania.
answers.bResponse: The Romanian authorities have been offering various language courses, including Ukrainian, for refugees from Ukraine who seek to improve their language skills in order to facilitate communication with locals and integrate into society better.
